description:
Akane`s senpai tells her that she`s quitting their club to study for entrance exams. Akane starts to wonder if Konomi will also quit, feeling sad as she remembers that Konomi was the one who helped her make friends in the club and improve her flute playing. On her way home, Akane runs into Konomi at the station. She tells Akane that she`s on her way to visit the Koshigayas and was looking around at a festival going on near the station for some gifts to bring them. So Akane ends up wandering around the festival with Konomi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Senpai Had Entrance Exams Coming Up
先輩はもうすぐ受験だった
